name: Brian Alvarez
themes: Academic Difficulty, Cultural Representation, Language Barriers, Personal Growth, Support Networks
description: Brian Alvarez, a first-generation and immigrant student, shares his challenging journey in the engineering program, where he experiences academic difficulty, language barriers, and a sense of not belonging due to cultural differences. However, he also emphasizes personal growth, support from his wife, and the contribution he can make to the engineering community by highlighting the perspectives of underserved communities.
